about_the_game:
In this narrative-driven psychological horror game, Andrew, the neighborhood babysitter, has been asked by his parents to watch their friend's son, Liam, whilst they go out for the night. Being seventeen, and not minding spending his Friday night making some easy cash, he accepts... but Liam is no ordinary child.

FEATURES


As with all children that he babysits, Andrew decides to play some games with Liam to pass the time:

  • Spot the difference
  • Animal's Calling
  • Charades
  • Hide and Seek

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scene of vulgar language, violence, alcohol, tobacco, and implied drug use.

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K (or equal)
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1650 (or equal)
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This system is what the game was built on. The game is optimized, and will continue to be further once released, based on player feedback about overall performance.

short_description: Seeking to make some easy money, a high school senior decides to babysit a strange little boy... with an even stranger imaginary friend.
